Package com.epoch.session

Classes that interact with a specific user doing specific actions on the front end.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminSession
    Holds an administrator's session.
    AnonSession
    All functions performed by a user who is not logged in yet.
    BookSet
    Describes the chapters of a Pearson textbook.
    ChapterSet
    Contains the questions that derive from a Pearson textbook chapter.
    CrossCourseReport
    For storing student response results from different courses.
    ExportImportSession
    Session to extract homework information into a string which can be stored externally, and vice versa.
    GradeSet
    Holds the grades of one or all students in a course.
    HWCreateSession
    Session object to create a single assignment.
    HWSession
    Corresponds to a homework session taken by the student, a preview of a question by an author, or a way to get information about a question, given its serial number in an assignment.
    InstructorSession
    An instructor's work session.
    KeywordSet
    Contains the questions that share certain keywords.
    QSet
    A question set for editing.
    QuestionBank
    Initiates an authoring session.
    RegradeSession
    Used to perform the forced regrade on a single question of an assignment when the question is changed after students have already begun to work it and the grades of some responses may change.
    StudentSession
    A student's work session.
    Timer
    Halts a thread that is taking too long.
    UserSession
    A user's work session.

Package com.epoch.session Description

Classes that interact with a specific user doing specific actions on the front end.
